channel.title: Loss on Grady Berry Ward
channel.description: Recent content in Loss on Grady Berry Ward

item.description: “Let’s go say goodbye.”, “To the house?”, “To the house.” It’s dark inside, the fading day is blue, filtered in. The bathroom light a contrasting a vibrant yellow as he goes for a final pee. I’m glued to the wall, seeing the house spotless for the first time since it was last a house. We’d made it more. We’d chosen mistmatched glasses, argued over the layout of the couch, compromised, built furniture to accomodate the compromise.
